name: Tag WebinarJam Replay Attendees in KlickTipp
description:
This scenario helps you tag WebinarJam participants in KlickTipp based on whether they watched the replay of a webinar.

It fetches the registrant data from WebinarJam to see who viewed the replay and for how long. Depending on this, the scenario applies the correct tags in KlickTipp.

Tags are used to segment contacts who watched the replay, those who fully watched it, and those who did not watch it at all. It works with multiple webinars and makes it easier to run replay-based follow-ups or analyze overall engagement.

This scenario is helpful for evergreen webinars or for those leads who did not attend live but still showed interest by watching the replay.
